verses.verse: The word <WH1697> of Jehovah <WH3068> that came to Jeremiah <WH3414> the prophet <WH5030> concerning the Philistines <WH6430>, before that Pharaoh <WH6547> smote <WH5221> Gaza <WH5804>.

Thus saith <WH559> Jehovah <WH3068>: Behold <WH4325>, waters rise up <WH5927> out of the north <WH6828>, and shall become an overflowing <WH7857> stream <WH5158>, and shall overflow <WH7857> the land <WH776> and all that is therein <WH4393>, the city <WH5892> and them that dwell <WH3427> therein <WH120>; and the men shall cry <WH2199>, and all the inhabitants <WH3427> of the land <WH776> shall wail <WH3213>.

At the noise <WH6963> of the stamping <WH8161> of the hoofs <WH6541> of his strong <WH47> ones <WH7494>, at the rushing of his chariots <WH7393>, at the rumbling <WH1995> of his wheels <WH1534>, the fathers <WH1> look not back <WH6437> to their children <WH1121> for feebleness <WH7510> of hands <WH3027>;

because of the day <WH3117> that cometh <WH935> to destroy <WH7703> all the Philistines <WH6430>, to cut off <WH3772> from Tyre <WH6865> and Sidon <WH6721> every helper <WH5826> that remaineth <WH8300>: for Jehovah <WH3068> will destroy <WH7703> the Philistines <WH6430>, the remnant <WH7611> of the isle <WH339> of Caphtor <WH3731>.
Baldness <WH7144> is come <WH935> upon Gaza <WH5804>; Ashkelon <WH831> is brought to nought <WH1820>, the remnant <WH7611> of their valley <WH6010>: how long wilt thou cut thyself <WH1413>?
O <WH1945> thou sword <WH2719> of Jehovah <WH3068>, how long will it be ere <WH3808> thou be quiet <WH8252>? put up <WH622> thyself into thy scabbard <WH8593>; rest <WH7280>, and be still <WH1826>.

How canst thou be quiet <WH8252>, seeing Jehovah <WH3068> hath given thee a charge <WH6680>? Against Ashkelon <WH831>, and against the <WH3220> sea-shore <WH2348>, there hath he appointed it <WH3259>.
